name: Designing for energy-efficient, low-carbon buildings: public buildings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session covers low carbon building design imperatives such as responsible sourcing, embodied carbon calculations, technology integration, landscape design, and human behaviour. Case studies demonstrate the latest thinking.

presentations.name: “The Hive” – Worcester library and history centre: BREEAM outstanding
presentations.speakers: Jo Wright, Partner Studio Leader, Feilden Clegg Bradley Studios
